summary: My 2nd dungeon for Skyrim. Hope you enjoy it like the first!
descriptionHtml:
[Important stuff please read]
----------------------------------------
First thanks to all who are going to play this. This is my 2nd dungeon for Skyrim. With this dungeons I want to improve the fun you have while exploring Skyrim.
This dungeon starts in The Bannered Mare (look first picture). After you talked to the person the mod will explain by it self.
Please do not play this mod until you are minimal level 30. The boss of this dungeon is really really hard and you have to kill him with tactic.
I added two new weapon types!
1. The giant club is now a playable weapon!
2. The boss have got 2 weapons. A 1handed and a 2handed sword. You have to equip the 1handed sword in the right hand and the 2handed in the left hand. And the you go with a 1 and 2 handed sword!
Important: This mod is not finished yet! There will be a 2nd part soon.

[Installation]
-----------------
Please download manually! Unzip the folder and drag and drop the SEQ folder and the Splited Tongue.esp in your Skyrim Data folder.
This can be found in your Steam direction: Steam>steamapps>common>Skyrim>Data

[Unimportant stuff]
--------------------------
Again thanks to all the people wo are going to play this. I love modding really. And I try hard to make my dungeons good. I appreciate every comment! Criticism,improvements or other stuf, please write me what you are thinking about this!
And again I would like to apologize my English. I am German :)
author: freschd
